text: Even if the whole world is against you, as long as you believe in yourself, you'll always have the strength to carry on.
It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it's the choices they make with their lives.
The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us, doing the best it can... That’s what makes it so damn beautiful.
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
I am not going to die because I am the main character!
A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart.
The world is not perfect. But it's there for us, doing the best it can... that's what makes it so damn beautiful.
You can’t sit around envying other people’s worlds. You have to go out and change your own.
I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future!
The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
In our society, letting others see your tears is considered weak, but I think it takes more courage to cry than to smile.
It’s not the end yet. It’s just the beginning of a new battle.
No matter what happens, don't forget. You must keep moving forward.
When you give up, that’s when the game is over.
To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to happiness you could have.
